con:request.name: AddCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddCardToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate> <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber> <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard> <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddCardToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddCardToken (Corp)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddCardToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CorpCardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate> <acr2:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${CorpCardMagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr2:CardNumber> <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CorpCardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:NameOnCard>${CorpCardNameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard> <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddCardToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddCardToken (RSA)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddCardToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}-RSA</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr2:CardExpirationDate> <acr2:CardNumber>${CardNumberRSA}</acr2:CardNumber> <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr2:NameOnCard> <acr2:TaxExempt>true</acr2:TaxExempt> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddCardToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
